Features

Wipe away the day with Makeup Remover Wipes with Mineral Complex. Use the face wipes to wipe away all your face and eye makeup. The cleansing wipes easily remove makeup and everything else! Leaving your skin feeling clean and refreshed. Carry the wipes in your gym bag or purse for easy access to clean skin all the time! Includes 24 cleansing wipes.

To use

  • Lift the resealable adhesive strip and remove one towelete, wipe over entire face including eye area to remove all traces of makeup
  • Immediately close the adhesive strip after each use to protect wipes from drying out
  • Do not flush

Benefits

  • Non-greasy and gentle
  • Easily removes any face or eye makeup
  • Great for home or travel!
  • Skin feels totally cleansed and refreshed
  • Enriched with minerals including zinc, magnesium, iron, and copper

Ingredients

  • Diisopropyl Dimer Dilinoleate
  • Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate
  • Lanolin
  • Tridecyl Trimellitate
  • Synthetic Wax

Reviews

Very happily surprised!

By Starlite77 on 8/1/2017

From: San Antonio, TX
Age: 35-44
I shop Avon: more than 6x a year
Skin Type: Combination

I have tried so many different creams and treatments over the years, from premium to budget, and they have either had no results or caused my sensitive skin to break out and react. After using a simple and gentle moisturiser for a while, I decided it was time to give another "treatment" style cream a go....I am so incredibly glad I did!

I have been using this product for about a month now and my skin loves it! Normally my skin lets me know very quickly if it reacts to a product...ususally within first few days...
Read more

Was this review helpful? Yes / No

Very happily surprised!

By Starlite77 on 8/1/2017

From: San Antonio, TX
Age: 35-44
I shop Avon: more than 6x a year

I have tried so many different creams and treatments over the years, from premium to budget, and they have either had no results or caused my sensitive skin to break out and react. After using a simple and gentle moisturiser for a while, I decided it was time to give another "treatment" style cream a go....I am so incredibly glad I did!

I have been using this product for about a month now and my skin loves it! Normally my skin lets me know very quickly if it reacts to a product...ususally within first few days...
